get.description: Retrieves a list of albums with optional sorting, pagination, and search

post.description: Creates a new album with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific album by ID

put.description: Updates the details of a specific album by ID

delete.description: Deletes a specific album by ID

put.description: Sets a specific image as the cover for an album by album ID and image name

post.description: Uploads one or more images to the specified album

delete.description: Deletes a specific image from an album by album ID and image name
delete.summary: Delete an image from an album

get.description: Retrieves a list of all alerts with optional search, pagination, and sorting

post.description: Creates a new alert with the provided details

get.summary: Get alert by service and page

put.description: Updates an existing alert with the provided details

delete.description: Deletes an existing alert by ID

get.description: Returns a list of audiences, supports search and pagination

get.description: Returns a list of categories, supports search and pagination

get.description: Serves the Swagger UI for API documentation.
Returns a list of events with details, including category, location, audience, and organizer info. Supports historical filtering, limit, and offset.

post.description: Creates a new event with the provided details. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all event audiences.
Retrieves a list of all event categories active.
Retrieves a list of all time types for events.
Retrieves a specific protected event by its ID, including detailed information such as category, location, audience, and organizer info.

put.description: Updates an existing event with the provided details. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes an event by its ID. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns a list of forms, supports search and pagination
Returns a submission by its ID

put.description: Accepts an array of questions and updates them

get.description: Returns a form by its ID
Retrieves a list of all available text services.
Retrieves all text content available in the specified path of a text service.
get.summary: Get all content in a specified path

put.description: Updates text content in the specified path of a text service.
put.summary: Update content in a specified path

get.description: Retrieves text content for a specific language in the specified path of a text service.

post.description: Creates text content in the specified service and path for a given language.

get.description: Retrieves all paths available in the specified text service.
get.summary: Get all paths in a specified service

post.description: Uploads an image file to the specified path in the image service.

get.description: Retrieves a list of image URLs available in the specified path.
get.summary: Get image URLs in a specified path in a digital ocean bucket

delete.description: Deletes an image file from the specified path in the image service.
delete.summary: Delete an image from a specified path in a digital ocean bucket

parameters.description: Path where the image is located
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Name of the image to delete
parameters.name: imageName

get.description: Health check endpoint. Returns a simple pong message.

get.description: Returns, for each category, the number of events in the last 3 months. Only categories with at least one event are included, ordered by event count descending.
Returns a list of the newest additions across events, categories, audiences, rules, organizations, locations, and job advertisements. Ordered by creation date, limited by the 'limit' query parameter.
Returns total counts for events, jobs, organizations, locations, and rules (excluding deleted records).
Returns API version and uptime.
